messages.subject: Need Links
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, I m setting up the skeleton for the 4th incarnation of SHQ (updates can be read here: http://shinsengumihq.livejournal.com/37668.html) Anyways, I d like
messages.messageBody:
Hello,

I'm setting up the skeleton for the 4th incarnation of SHQ (updates can be
read here: http://shinsengumihq.livejournal.com/37668.html)

Anyways, I'd like to post links to *completed works of fiction (original or
fanfiction), manga and also art.

I will attempt to restore a decent gallery of the fanart which was part of
the old SHQ but for now I can easily put up links.

Thanks ~ secretarytocapt3
